Style/WordArray.description:
Description

Use %w or %W for arrays of words.
Style/WordArray.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: percent (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['percent', 'brackets'] (type: list)
MinSize: 2 (type: int)
WordRegex: /\A(?:\p{Word}|\p{Word}-\p{Word}|\n|\t)+\z/ (type: str)
